title: Supply Rot
description: Mold has grown in the pantries and there are signs of rats. A large portion of the food is damaged. We could burn it to avoid illness.

options.text: Beck - There's no way around it. This mold is dangerous and could kill people. We need to cut our losses.
options.outcome: You burn the supplies as the miners stare into the flames, stomachs growling.

options.text: Old-Timer - Are you crazy? Destroy what little food we have? Just tear off the bad parts and keep moving.
options.outcome: No food was wasted, but many miners have died of dysentery.

options.text: Shady - We can't lose all of it. Get rid of the worst of it and salvage what we can.
options.outcome: The miners trim the mold off the rations where possible and burn what can't be salvaged. Spirits are low, but our foodbank is ok.
